Comments_List: I developed a solid grounding in both the broader framework and finer details of syntactic theory. I now feel capable of engaging with contemporary research and attempting to solve problematic issues in syntax.

One strength of the course was the engagement both with a general textbook as well as more fine-grained academic papers. This allowed me to feel comfortable in my base of knowledge while also providing new challenges.

Yes, I would certainly recommend this course if someone eventually wanted to undertake original research in theoretical syntax. The grounding in the field provided by Syntax II is invaluable for these purposes.
